23 int sysfs_notsup(void);
24 void * sysfs_notsup_null(void);
25 void sysfs_notsup_void(void);
26 int sysfs_always_mounted(const void *);
27 
28 #define SYSFS_NOTSUP ((void*)sysfs_notsup)
29 #define SYSFS_NOTSUP_VOID ((void*)sysfs_notsup_void)
30 
31 typedef struct {
32  const char mount_path[PATH_MAX];
33  const int access;
34  int (*mount)(const void*);
35  int (*unmount)(const void*);
36  int (*ismounted)(const void*);
37  int (*startup)(const void*);
38  int (*mkfs)(const void*);
39  int (*open)(const void*, void**, const char*, int, int);
40  int (*priv_read)(const void*, void*, device_transfer_t*);
41  int (*priv_write)(const void*, void*, device_transfer_t*);
42  int (*priv_ioctl)(const void*, void*, int, void*);
43  int (*read)(const void*, void*, int, int, void*, int);
44  int (*write)(const void*, void*, int, int, const void*, int);
45  int (*close)(const void*, void**);
46  int (*fstat)(const void*, void*, struct stat*);
47  int (*rename)(const void*, const char*, const char*);
48  int (*unlink)(const void*, const char*);
49  int (*mkdir)(const void*, const char*, mode_t);
50  int (*rmdir)(const void*, const char*);
51  int (*remove)(const void*, const char*);
52  int (*opendir)(const void*, void**, const char*);
53  int (*closedir)(const void*, void**);
54  int (*readdir_r)(const void*, void*, int, struct dirent*);
55  int (*link)(const void*, const char *, const char*);
56  int (*symlink)(const void*, const char *, const char*);
57  int (*stat)(const void*, const char *, struct stat*);
58  int (*lstat)(const void*, const char *, struct stat*);
59  int (*chmod)(const void*, const char*, int mode);
60  int (*chown)(const void*, const char*, uid_t uid, gid_t gid);
61  void (*unlock)(const void*);
62  const void * cfg;
63 } sysfs_t;

98 #define SYSFS_READONLY_ACCESS (S_IRUSR|S_IRGRP|S_IROTH|S_IXUSR|S_IXGRP|S_IXOTH)
99 #define SYSFS_ALL_ACCESS (0777)
100 
101 #define SYSFS_ROOT(mount_loc_name, cfgp, access_mode) { \
102  .mount_path = mount_loc_name, \
103  .access = access_mode, \
104  .mount = rootfs_init, \
105  .unmount = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
106  .ismounted = sysfs_always_mounted, \
107  .startup = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
108  .mkfs = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
109  .open = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
110  .priv_read = NULL, \
111  .priv_write = NULL, \
112  .read = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
113  .write = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
114  .priv_ioctl = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
115  .close = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
116  .rename = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
117  .unlink = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
118  .mkdir = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
119  .rmdir = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
120  .remove = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
121  .opendir = rootfs_opendir, \
122  .closedir = rootfs_closedir, \
123  .readdir_r = rootfs_readdir_r, \
124  .link = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
125  .symlink = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
126  .stat = rootfs_stat, \
127  .lstat = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
128  .fstat = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
129  .chmod = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
130  .chown = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
131  .unlock = SYSFS_NOTSUP_VOID, \
132  .cfg = cfgp, \
133 }
134 
135 #define SYSFS_DEV(mount_loc_name, cfgp, access_mode) { \
136  .mount_path = mount_loc_name, \
137  .access = access_mode, \
138  .mount = devfs_init, \
139  .unmount = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
140  .ismounted = sysfs_always_mounted, \
141  .startup = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
142  .mkfs = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
143  .open = devfs_open, \
144  .priv_read = devfs_priv_read, \
145  .priv_write = devfs_priv_write, \
146  .priv_ioctl = devfs_priv_ioctl, \
147  .read = NULL, \
148  .write = NULL, \
149  .close = devfs_close, \
150  .rename = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
151  .unlink = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
152  .mkdir = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
153  .rmdir = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
154  .remove = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
155  .opendir = devfs_opendir, \
156  .closedir = devfs_closedir, \
157  .readdir_r = devfs_readdir_r, \
158  .link = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
159  .symlink = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
160  .stat = devfs_stat, \
161  .lstat = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
162  .fstat = devfs_fstat, \
163  .chmod = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
164  .chown = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
165  .unlock = SYSFS_NOTSUP_VOID, \
166  .cfg = cfgp, \
167 }

169 #define SYSFS_APP(mount_loc_name, cfgp, access_mode) { \
170  .mount_path = mount_loc_name, \
171  .access = access_mode, \
172  .mount = appfs_init, \
173  .unmount = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
174  .ismounted = sysfs_always_mounted, \
175  .startup = appfs_startup, \
176  .mkfs = appfs_mkfs, \
177  .open = appfs_open, \
178  .priv_read = appfs_priv_read, \
179  .priv_write = appfs_priv_write, \
180  .read = NULL, \
181  .write = NULL, \
182  .close = appfs_close, \
183  .priv_ioctl = appfs_priv_ioctl, \
184  .rename = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
185  .unlink = appfs_unlink, \
186  .mkdir = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
187  .rmdir = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
188  .remove = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
189  .opendir = appfs_opendir, \
190  .closedir = appfs_closedir, \
191  .readdir_r = appfs_readdir_r, \
192  .link = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
193  .symlink = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
194  .stat = appfs_stat, \
195  .lstat = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
196  .fstat = appfs_fstat, \
197  .chmod = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
198  .chown = SYSFS_NOTSUP, \
199  .unlock = SYSFS_NOTSUP_VOID, \
200  .cfg = cfgp, \
201 }

203 #define SYSFS_TERMINATOR { \
204  .mount = NULL \
205 }

218 static inline bool sysfs_isterminator(const sysfs_t * fs);
219 bool sysfs_isterminator(const sysfs_t * fs){
220  if ( fs->mount == NULL ){
221  return true;
222  }
223  return false;
224 }
